document_data.name: Yarberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Yarberries''' were deadly poisonous red berries from [[Thay]]. They were one of the most abundant and well-known plants in Thay in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Yarberries turned red when ripened, becoming very poisonous fruit. The berries were so bright and distinctive, they were used to describe beautiful and desirable colors.
